description.raw:
I added the world file (ffdb75c), so to test,

  - download luke hand model from deka, copy `luke_hand_description` into `~/.gazebo/models/`
  - run `gazebo --verbose worlds/luke_hand.world`

Changes/Updates:

* add arm sensor offset sdf parsing.
* add a torque filter.
* add joint clutching
* updates to transmission, misc fixes.
* adding poisson's ratio and elastic modulus
* restrict spheres to 1 single contact
* update model
* update contact properties
* enable physics test, setup a grasp in test. adding a pinch test
* fix index ab-ad for cylindrical grasp
* rename haptixJoints to simJoints, better matches what they are.
    * added clutch limit pinching mechanism.
    * add referenceJoint for gearboxes.
    * add JointHelper::GetRealJoint to access gazebo joint.
    * added differential transmission.
    * added thread_position_correction for performance.
    * add joint spring implementation.
    * refactor hand control update.
